page.title: 20THE DOMESDAY PROJECT
page.content: The work carried out on this section of {"The Domesday Project"}was done jointly by the Mr.C.J.Thompson and a group of older children from Hopton First School,Woodend Road,Hopton, Mirfield.together with Mr.D.Ellis, Mrs.Y.Brocklehurst & Mrs.P.Ross and children from Bases 6 & 7 at Crowlees C.E.First School,Springfield Park, Parker Lane,Mirfield. We wish to acknowledge the help given to us by the mothers and friends who helped us in many ways on our fact finding missions. We also wish to acknowledge the time and help given by various members of the community in showing us around farms and other buildings as well as answering our questions and giving us information. Following work done on the project we know far more about our local area.
